hero.heading: Exploring the Universe Within and Beyond
hero.text: A celebration of knowledge, innovation, and human curiosity. From the tiniest atoms to the farthest galaxies, every mystery awaits discovery. Join us on a journey to explore the wonders of science — within us and beyond the stars.

about.heading: Why attend Explorion
about.subheading: Explorion is not just an event, it’s a journey into the unknown, inspiring the next generation of thinkers, dreamers, and innovators.
about.text: Explorion is where ideas take shape and imagination finds purpose. From interactive experiments to thought-provoking exhibitions, the event brings together curious minds eager to explore the wonders of science. Whether you’re a participant, a visitor, or a mentor, Explorion offers the perfect space to learn, share, and get inspired by innovation happening all around you.

segments.title: Robotics & Automation Challenge
segments.summary: Build, program, and compete with your own robots in thrilling automation tasks.
segments.details: Participants will design and construct robots capable of performing specific tasks, such as navigating obstacle courses, completing challenges, or engaging in robot battles. This segment encourages creativity, engineering skills, and teamwork.

segments.title: Innovation & Model Exhibition
segments.summary: Showcase creative models and prototypes that solve real-world problems.
segments.details: Participants will present innovative models or prototypes that address various challenges, ranging from environmental issues to technological advancements. This segment promotes critical thinking, problem-solving, and creativity.

segments.title: Environmental Science Fair
segments.summary: Present projects that promote sustainability and eco-friendly innovation.
segments.details: Participants will develop projects focused on environmental conservation, renewable energy, waste management, and other sustainability topics. This segment aims to raise awareness about environmental issues and inspire eco-conscious solutions.

segments.title: Tech Art & Poster Design
segments.summary: Combine creativity and science through artistic visuals and posters.
segments.details: Participants will create visually appealing posters or artworks that communicate scientific concepts, technological advancements, or environmental themes. This segment encourages artistic expression and effective communication of complex ideas.

segments.title: Space & Astronomy Quest
segments.summary: Explore the mysteries of the universe with quizzes, discussions, and observations.
segments.details: Participants will engage in activities related to space exploration, astronomy, and astrophysics. This segment includes quizzes, interactive discussions, and stargazing sessions to deepen understanding of the cosmos.

segments.title: Math Marathon
segments.summary: Combine creativity and science through artistic visuals and posters.
segments.details: Participants will tackle a series of challenging mathematical problems and puzzles that test their analytical and problem-solving skills. This segment promotes logical thinking, numerical proficiency, and a love for mathematics.

segments.title: Science Quiz Bowl
segments.summary: Test your knowledge across all fields of science in a fast-paced quiz.
segments.details: Participants will compete in a quiz format that covers various scientific disciplines, including physics, chemistry, biology, and general science. This segment encourages quick thinking, teamwork, and a broad understanding of scientific concepts.

segments.title: Scientific Debate
segments.summary: Express your ideas and defend your stance on thought-provoking scientific topics.
segments.details: Participants will engage in structured debates on various scientific issues, encouraging critical thinking, effective communication, and the ability to analyze different perspectives. This segment fosters a deeper understanding of scientific discourse and argumentation.

faqs.question: Who can participate in Explorion?
faqs.answer: Explorion is open to students, educators, and science enthusiasts of all ages who are passionate about exploring scientific concepts and innovations.

faqs.question: How do I register for the event?
faqs.answer: You can register for Explorion through our online registration portal available on the event website. Simply fill out the registration form and submit it before the deadline.

faqs.question: Are there any participation fees?
faqs.answer: Participation in Explorion is free of charge. However, certain segments may have specific requirements or materials that participants need to bring.

faqs.question: What safety measures are in place for the event?
faqs.answer: We prioritize the safety and well-being of all participants. We will adhere to local health guidelines and implement necessary safety protocols during the event.

faqs.question: Can I volunteer for the event?
faqs.answer: Yes! We welcome volunteers who are interested in contributing to the success of Explorion. Please contact us through the volunteer section on our website for more information.

faqs.question: Will there be prizes for the competitions?
faqs.answer: Yes, there will be awards and recognition for outstanding participants in various segments of the event. Details about the prizes will be provided during the event.

faqs.question: How can I stay updated about the event?
faqs.answer: You can stay updated by following our official social media channels and subscribing to our newsletter for the latest news and announcements about Explorion.

faqs.question: Who can I contact for more information?
faqs.answer: For more information, please reach out to us via the contact form on our website or email us at info@explorion.com.

faqs.question: What should I bring to the event?
faqs.answer: Participants are encouraged to bring any materials or equipment required for their specific segments. Additionally, please bring a valid ID and any necessary documentation for registration.
